title: Goal!
description: Giroud shoots - or at least that was his intention - miscues it across the box and Ozil cleverly steers it home from 10 yards with Dier playing him onside

title: Yellow card
description: Kane is booked for an old-fashioned slide on Giroud

title: Yellow card
description: Monreal is booked for a fairly cynical body check on Walker

title: Yellow-card
description: Koscielny slides in - clumsily so - and concedes a free kick. He is booked for his trouble

title: Goal!
description: Harry Kane gets his 21st goal of the season knocking the ball in at the back post following a corner

title: Substitution
description: The hosts make a change as Nacer Chadli comes on to replace Dembele for the final 15 minutes or so

title: Substitution
description: A change for Arsenal as Welbeck makes way to be replaced by Theo Walcott

title: Yellow card
description: Mason gets the obligatory yellow card for blocking a quick free kick

title: Yellow card
description: Giroud becomes the latest name in the book for a late challenge on Mason in midfield

title: Goal!
description: Harry Kane has done it again and may well have given Spurs the lead in his first ever North London derby

title: Full-time
description: That Harry Kane huh? He has just helped Tottenham to leapfrog Arsenal and make it to the top four!
